title: End of game gifting
body:
Hey Summoner,

we think we fixed the end of game gifting issue in OCE and I was wondering whether someone can help me confirming this is actually working (I'm in the US and I don't want to ruin someone's experience by playing from here and lagging).

Thanks
MM

replies.body: I will check this out when I get home. But that's in about 9 hours. So hopefully someone will check it out before that.
If I get gifted by a stranger after a game, I'll eat my shoes.

> [{quoted}](name=MasterMirkinen,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Ao3JJpgu,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-11T19:29:17.695+0000)
> Hey Summoner,
> 
> we think we fixed the end of game gifting issue in OCE and I was wondering whether someone can help me confirming this is actually working (I'm in the US and I don't want to ruin someone's experience by playing from here and lagging).
> 
> Thanks
> MM

Item: 490 mystery gift. Recipient: c0mikal (>2 week friend)

Can only gift recommended items; there's no dropdown/collapse list to browse items (not sure if this is intended). Sender is notified of which skin was received. The recipient does NOT receive any notification of the gift, although it shows up as "owned" in the champions tab (I told him which one he recieved via Skype). There is a large delay before RP is deducted (I relogged and still had to wait for a while). Doesn't show up in Gifting History.

Hopefully I don't run out of RP before Christmas now :( After Eternum Rek'sai I won't have a lot left for any sales that come on. :/
Okay, doesn't seem to be working. Will put details in next post.
If possible, you should check how many people actually gift after the game to see if it's actually a good idea or not because not many people will gift strangers...

lets be honest, after every game on oce its gg ez nubs, bg, report ***, your all bad, etc etc

gifts are the last thing on peoples minds.
